grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 碑【イシブミ】stone monument bearing an inscription (esp. memorial for future generations), stele, stela
詩碑【シヒ】monument (stele, gravestone, etc.) engraved with a poem
慰霊碑【イレイヒ】cenotaph, memorial monument
kun reading compounds: 碑【いしぶみ】stone monument bearing an inscription (esp. memorial for future generations), stele, stela
